timestamps.title: B.Tech (ongoing)
timestamps.description: Studying B.Tech from GNIOT affiliated to A.K.T.U.

timestamps.title: Robotic Arm Model - Winner
timestamps.description: Second in project exhibition by Directorate of Education in Delhi. First in project exhibition in zone, district and state level by CBSE.

timestamps.title: IoT Traffic Management Model
timestamps.description: Was awarded 2nd by Delhi Urban Art Commission.

timestamps.title: Earned two Microsoft Technology Certificate
timestamps.description: Self studied from MVA and other online resources.

timestamps.title: Made an PWM wireless controlled car.
timestamps.description: Participated in Robo-Race Competition. It was unique car there, wireless and having precise control.

timestamps.title: Android Game Published
timestamps.description: Published an 2d android game on play store.

timestamps.title: Contributed on Nano Framework
timestamps.description: Actively found and resolved bugs for the open source Nano Framework and its release of MQTT in stable.

timestamps.title: Motion Detection Surveillance System
timestamps.description: Created UWP app to monitor and alert its clients for and motion seen by camera. Implemented its whole algorithm as libraries were not compatible with UWP.

timestamps.title: Library for Console Gui (ongoing)
timestamps.description: Fun ongoing side project. Aim is to create a library that provides console gui components to be used in simple console app.
